Traditional Spanish villa close to the town of Andilla in the Valencia region of Spain
The property comprises an 8m x 9m lounge / dining room, kitchen, 4 double bedrooms and a family bathroom. To the front of the property there is a covered terrace overlooking the 8m x4m pool and surrounding countryside.
The property has solar power with generator, water deposit, garage, stables, storage rooms and a pelota court.

Contemporary style villa close to the spa bath resort at Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain
The property comprises a lounge with open fireplace, good size kitchen, double bedroom with large fitted wardrobe and bathroom on the ground floor. On the 1st floor, there is a further double bedroom with en suite and fitted wardrobe and 2 solariums with good views of the surrounding countryside. There is a large covered terrace to the side of the house that leas into the easily maintained gardens. The property benefits from solar heated water.
The property has shared access to a communal pool close by.

Well established restaurant with living accommodation between Fortuna and Los Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
This thriving family business attracts customers from a wide geographical area and is popular with many nationalities. Famous for its traditional English fayre and wonderful pasties and pastries. The premises are fully licensed and are offered for sale as a going concern.
The main restaurant with conservatory has 38 covers in total and caters for occasional diners and parties. In addition, there are 38 covers outdoors, part of which is covered. Within the main restaurant is the bar and there is a private car park to the front of the restaurant.
The living accommodation is set over 3/4 floors with the opportunity for B&B. On the ground floor is the main kitchen for the restaurant, a 2nd kitchen for busy trade, a private the family lounge and the office. On the first floor there are 2 double bedrooms with en suites. On the next level there are 3 further bedrooms, a shower room and toilet with wash basin. Also on this level is a lounge / TV room that could be used as the 6th bedroom with outdoor balcony terrace. To the front of the living accommodation is an 8m x 4m pool. To the rear of the property is a private courtyard and small garden. There is also a large basement for storage.
All the fixtures and fittings are included in the sale and the accounts are available for inspection.
Need more photos? Ask us in the Make an enquiry box above and we will send them to you.

A stunning large country house on a 21,000m2 plot, with detached cottage, two self-contained apartments and stables for 13 horses all situated in the lovely hamlet of El Fraile Gordo between Pinoso and Abanilla. The main building is a 200 year old, lovingly restored monks house with 10 spacious rooms all with high ceilings and original beams. The entire reformation has been completed to a very high standard and sympathetic to the age and character of the property. The master bedroom is very large, has a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom with corner bath, two sinks, a large enclosed shower area, wc and bidet. Off the bedroom is a separate sitting room with fitted wardrobes and a large bathroom. Leading from the sitting room is a private sun terrace overlooking the pool. On the first floor a spiral staircase leads to a mezzanine gallery ideal for a library and quiet sitting area. The first floor also has four double bedrooms (one with quality fitted furniture), two en-suite bathrooms and one independent bathroom. all rooms have great views of the surrounding mountains and valley.

A large old semi-detached country house close to the town of Abanilla and the spa baths in Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property comprises of an entrance hallway that leads into a traditional Spanish family room. Leading from this room there is a hallway that goes to the bathroom and one of the bedrooms. On the opposite side of the family room there is one bedroom that could be used as a dining room or separate lounge. There are a further 2 bedrooms on either side of the entrance hallway.
There is an upper floor of the same size that could be converted into further living accommodation.
Outside there is a BBQ, bodega (wine cellar), garage and store room. The plot is flat with great views of the surrounding countryside and ample space for a pool.
Only 5 minutes from the town, restaurants, banks, bar supermarkets etc. and 45 minutes from Alicante airport and beaches.
Smartmove Properties Spain are dedicated to ensuring that our customers who buy a property in Spain with us do so safely and their new home is fully legal. Please feel free to talk to us about any aspect of the buying process in Spain that you may be unsure about.

A well presented villa close to the spa bath resort at Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain
The property is set over 2 floors with the additional benefit of a roof terrace. The ground level comprises of an L-shaped entrance hallway, lounge with feature fireplace, modern fitted kitchen, 3 double bedrooms (1 with en suite bath) and a shower room.
Leading from the lounge there is a fully glazed terrace overlooking 2 terraces of the garden. Adjacent to this side of the house there is a utility / store room. On the opposite side of the house there is a large car port with steps leading to a further open terrace.
To the rear of the property is the access for the basement. This has the same footprint as upstairs and could easily be converted into guest accommodation.
The property has many extras including air conditioning throughout, solar hot water, telephone, internet, satellite TV, fitted wardrobes, alarm and access to 3 community swimming pools.

A delightful property close to the town centre of Jumilla in the Costa Calida / Murcia region of Spain
The ground floor has a spacious lounge with feature fireplace, dining room (large enough for a 10 seater table), kitchen with open fireplace, 2 double bedrooms and a bathroom. The ornate stairway leads to a grand landing where there are a further 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large utility room. There are also 2 terraces with dual aspects of the surrounding countryside.
The house has been tastefully refurbished by the current owners with a mixture of traditional and new features creating a wonderful family home. It benefits from air conditioning, alarm, telephone and internet.
The property is located within a 3 minute drive of the town centre yet is in a quiet countryside location. The plot is very private and entered through a large electric gate where there is a double car port, summer kitchen and a 6m x 12m pool complete with child friendly section. To one side of the main house is a large store room and a garage which will take at least 4 cars.
Jumilla is a large centre for wine production in Spain and has may wine bodegas and festivals throughout the year.

Traditional Spanish villa close to the historic town of Abanilla in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain
The main house comprises a large open plan lounge / dining room with feature log burner, kitchen, 4 bedrooms and a family bathroom. The property has recently undergone an extension with a new master bedroom, new bathroom (complete with sunken bath and walk in shower) and a further room to extend the kitchen (this has not been completed as yet).
There is a self contained casita in the garden with a further bedroom and shower room / utility room. Adjacent to this is a 6m x 3m pool and BBQ. The large covered terrace to the front of the house has great views across the valley towards Abanilla.
The property benefits from mains water & electricity, air conditioning in the lounge, traditional wooden shutters throughout and has an easily maintained garden with a good variety of trees and flowering shrubs. Easy walking distance to a friendly Spanish bar / restaurant.

Lovely country villa set in woodland near the tone of Cehegin in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
This large house is set over 2 floors. The ground floor comprises a large lounge with feature fireplace and bar area, kitchen, dining room and family bathroom. The internal stairs leading to a spacious landing where there are 4 bedrooms ant the 2nd family bathroom.
To the front of the house is a lovely covered terrace with outdoor kitchen / bbq to one side. In front of this is the pool and sun terrace with great views across the valley. To the rear of the house is a garage / workshop that is large enough for 3 cars. This could be converted into further guest accommodation if needed.
The house is set in a lovely woodland area approximately 3km from the town centre.

The lovely garden has an 8m x4m raised pool, utility room and shed.
There is a bus service to Vilamarxant where you will find many services including a supermarket, post office, medical centre, shops, bars and restaurants.

To the rear of the property there is a large garage, carport, workshop and a storage room. These could easily be converted into further guest accommodation. The rear of the plot is set to almond trees.

There is a private terrace with a BBQ and kitchen area that leads to the large community pool.
Centrally located to many amenities, it would make an ideal holiday retreat or the potential for holiday lets.

A stunning villa with fantastic views close to the town of Abanilla in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property is immaculate throughout with many features and comprises a very large lounge with fabulous feature glass block window. There is a patio door leading from the lounge onto an extensive, south facing covered terrace with fabulous views towards Abanilla town.
There is a stairway from the lounge leading to the first floor where you will find the master bedroom and a guest bedroom. The master bedroom has an en suite and a separate room which is currently used as a dressing room. This could also make a lovely study.
There is a large, private terrace leading from this room, again with wonderful, south facing views. On the ground floor is the 3rd guest bedroom, shower room and a wonderful modern style kitchen with ample space for a dining table.
Outside there is an 8m x 4m pool with large sun terrace and double garage. The mature gardens have a large variety of palms, trees and flowering plants.
The property has wooden floors throughout (except the kitchen), air conditioning, central heating, satellite TV, alarm and telephone and internet connections are available.

Villa for sale close to the town of Pinoso in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
Casa Oliva has been tastefully restored by the current owners and offers spacious accommodation in both the main house and its self contained annex. From all parts of the house and grounds, there are panoramic views over the surrounding countryside to the mountains beyond. The property is situated in a small village and has mains water and electricity connections.
Main House On entering the house there is a good size entrance hall leading to an open plan living and dining room. The fully fitted traditional Spanish kitchen is hand crafted by local carpenters. A generous size study with satellite broadband internet connection also leads from the main entrance hallway.
Upstairs there are three large double bedrooms (all with full en suite bathrooms) plus a single bedroom. The bedrooms all have vaulted ceilings with exposed beams. Each room also benefits from a ‘picture’ window giving wonderful views of the beautiful surrounding countryside. The master bedroom has a dressing room with hand crafted double wardrobes.
The upstairs landing also has a large storage cupboard. The property benefits from traditional wooden Spanish windows, shutters and doors throughout.
Self-Contained Annex The self-contained annex has a very large open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area with a high beamed ceiling. Upstairs there are two bedrooms - one double and one twin - plus a family bathroom.
Outside Outside there is a very attractive pool area with a 10m x 4m metre pool with saltwater chlorination system and a fully tiled surround with a brick and balustrade wall. There are two large fields containing nearly 200 maturing olive trees plus there is a large paved and gravelled area surrounding the house.
Local Information Casa Oliva is situated in a village in the beautiful Sierra de Salinas, surrounded by fields of vines, almonds and olives. It is 10 kms from the town of Pinoso and about the same distance from the town of Monovar.
The international airport at Alicante is about 45 minutes away and the wonderful sandy beaches north and south of Alicante are about 50 minutes away.
There are a number of excellent wine bodegas within ten to thirty minutes drive of the property. Plus the famous hot thermal baths at Fortuna are just a 30 minute drive from the house.

Garage, 20m² pool, 2 water deposits, solar system, internet, satelite tv complete the 3.200m² plot.

A stunning villa with self contained guest accommodation close to the town centre of Hondon de los Frailes in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
A true gem is the only description for this property. Space, quality and stylish living are in abundance throughout.
Set in a 2 tier plot overlooking the picturesque town and valley, the property comprises a large covered entrance terrace leading to a grand hallway. Leading through an archway, you a drawn into the extensive lounge and into the equally grand dining room. Another archway leads you to the modern style kitchen, complete with an informal dining area.
To the left of the entrance hallway, you will find the main guest bedroom. To the right, you enter the internal hallway that leads to the master bedroom (with large en suite), a further guest bedroom and the main bathroom with large jacuzzi bath.
A double patio door takes you to the 1st of 2 beautiful terraces with smoked glazing. This one overlooks the 10m x 5m pool and large sun terrace. Benefiting from the morning sun, there is a further large dining area to one side, in the centre a lounge and a study towards the other side. To the left of this there is an open terrace with panoramic views of the town and surrounding countryside.
The 2nd of the glazed terrace can be reached from the kitchen and the main entrance. This is even larger and wraps around the north and west elevations. It has 2 lounges with a cocktail bar in between making it ideal for entertaining. Leading through 2 sets of patio doors, there is a wonderful open terrace, again with fabulous views across the valley.
From the automatic entrance gate, there is a long driveway to the large garage and workshop (with electric door). Behind this, you will find a lovely outdoor kitchen with large dining area and traditional Spanish BBQ.
Accessed from the lower tier of the grounds, you will discover a fully self contained apartment comprising an open plan lounge / dining room, double bedroom, large shower room and a wine store. The shower room has dual access with one door leading to the pool.
The gardens are wonderful with palm, olive and fruit trees and feature a double petanque court. There is automatic irrigation throughout. There are a host of additional features including A/C, oil central heating, solar water heater, fly screens, log burner in the lounge, satellite TV, water softener and much more.
Additional photographs, floor plans and room sizes are available on request.
Put simply........... a delightful property!

desc.ko: 단장, 에어컨, 중앙 난방, 전화, 차고, 수영장, 마구간

desc.en:
Ideal holiday home close to the famous spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain
There are a choice of 2 properties each on their own plot. Each one comprises a very large lounge / dining room with air conditioning, kitchen complete with appliances, 2 double bedrooms, shower room and a further separate toilet. Each come with a garage. To the front, there is a large private terrace with views across the valley.
They are located within walking distance of the town centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna. There are a number of bars / restaurants very close by making them ideal holiday retreats.

Ideal holiday home close to the famous spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
There are a choice of 3 properties each on their own plot. Each one comprises a large lounge / dining room with air conditioning, kitchen complete with appliances, 2 double bedrooms and a shower room. Each come with a garage.
They are located within walking distance of the town centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna. There are a number of bars / restaurants very close by making them ideal holiday retreats.

Well presented country house close to the towns of La Romana and Aspe in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
This lovely property has an inviting covered terrace with decorative stonework and wooden beams. It comprises a good size lounge / dining room with feature fireplace and American style kitchen with feature stone archway. Leading down a few stairs is the well appointed shower room. Upstairs, there are 2 double bedrooms and a fabulous roof top terrace with great views across the surrounding countryside.
There is a raised swimming pool with sun terrace, a nice outdoor kitchen / BBQ and casitas that could be converted into further living accommodation. The gardens are mature with a variety of fruit trees and over 20 olive trees.
The property has mains electric, water deposit, internet and telephone.

Traditional Spanish villa within walking distance of Cehegin in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The main house comprises an entrance hallway, spacious lounge / dining room with triple aspect windows and modern pellet burning stove, kitchen, 3 double bedrooms and a family bathroom. Adjacent to the house is a fabulous covered terrace that is ideal for entertaining. It has a huge dining table that seats 16-20 people.
There is a large outdoor kitchen to one side and a courtyard with a T-shaped pool to the other side. The pool area is set within a courtyard with an outdoor lounge on the opposite side. Here, you will also find an outdoor shower room and toilet, store room and stairs leading to the rooftop terrace.
Beyond this, there is an informal garden with a number of outbuildings. The property has mains water / electric and benefits from, air conditioning, telephone, internet and satellite TV.
Cehegin is a medium size town with a large supermarket (Mercadona) and a great variety of shops, bars and restaurants.

Part renovated country home close to the town of Pinoso in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
This large property has great potential as a family home, B&B or to keep horses. Set on a very large plot with almond and olive trees, the property comprises a large entrance hallway, spacious lounge with log burning stove, large kitchen / dining room, utility room and 2 bedrooms on the ground floor. Upstairs, there are 3 more bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a large sitting area and a terrace with great views across the surrounding countryside.
Attached to the house is a large garage that has been part renovated to create a spacious lounge, dining room and a grand master bedroom and en suite above. On the opposite side of the house is a walled courtyard with bbq area.
The house has solar power (mains is available a short distance away - cost around 5.000€ to connect), a water deposit, oil central heating, telephone internet and satellite TV.

Lovely villa close to the centre of Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Set on a larger than average corner plot, the property comprises a good size lounge / dining room with feature fireplace, kitchen, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, en suite and a family bathroom. Leading from the lounge is a lovely covered terrace. To the side of the house is an 8m x 4m pool with ample sun terrace, bbq and pergola for outdoor dining.
An external stairway leads to the solarium with lovely views across citrus groves and the town centre. There are 2 bar / restaurants within easy walking distance and the town centre is 2 minutes by car where you will find a wide variety of shops, bars, restaurants and a great weekly market.
The property is located in within walking distance of the spa baths and leisure facilities in Baños de Fortuna and the same distance to the town centre.
Murcia city is 25 minutes away. On the outskirts of the city you will find no less 3 large shopping centres with cinemas, bowling and many eating places. There is a new tramway that connects the 2 largest shopping centres with the heart of the city where you will discover some good restaurants and many more shops.
Alicante airport is less than a 50 minute drive. Murcia airport (San Javier) is about a 55 minute drive and the new Corvera airport just to the south of Murcia can be reached in less than 30 minutes.
The beautiful beaches along the Costa Cálida and Costa Blanca can be reached in 50 minutes.

Lovely villa situated within walking distance of Alcocer de Planes in the Alicante region of Spain
The property comprises a large lounge / dining room with fireplace, kitchen, 3 bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom. The master bedroom has direct access to the garden. Easily maintained gardens with an 8m x 4m pool.
The property has mains water & electricity, a well and benefits from telephone, internet, satellite TV, central heating, air conditioning, bbq and car port.
Good access and only 3kms to the large town of Muro de Alcoy

Lovely country property not far from Muro de Alcoy in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property is set in a quiet location with wonderful views. It comprises a fully enclosed terrace that is currently used as the dining room, large lounge with fireplace, kitchen, 3 bedrooms and a family bathroom.
The large plot has ample space for a pool, car port, storage casita, olive and fruit trees. The property has mains electric and a water well.

Lovely villa between the towns of La Murada and Albatera in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
Set among citrus groves and orchards, the property comprises a 38m2 conservatory (summer lounge/ dining room with original well) leading to an entrance hall , 2 double bedrooms, one with en-suite bathroom and a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathroom. There is a large lounge (featuring large wood burning fireplace), country kitchen with central island, inner hallway, larder room, third large bathroom and a pool side room with built-in bar.
There is a lovely secluded inner courtyard with 6m x 4m swimming pool, utility room and entrance into a detached garage / workshop. There is also a store room and tractor shed.
Entry to the property via double gated entrance to paved driveway (space for 4/5 cars). Walled planted garden with small rounded paved area, side patio with built-in bbq. The property has mains water and electric, alarm system, telephone, internet and satellite TV.
The property is welcoming and full of character, ideal home for those who want to live in “real” Spain yet not remote from local amenities and services.

Lovely villa set on 4 acres with stables close to Pinoso in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property comprises a large entrance hallway, spacious lounge with corner fireplace, archway to a good size kitchen, utility room, 2 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom. To the rear of the house is a covered terrace overlooking the pool and walled sun terrace.
The plot is fully fenced with a large stable block and tack rooms. The property has mains electric / water, alarm system and telephone, internet and satellite TV are all connected. There is a local bar restaurant within walking distance and Pinoso centre is less than 10 minutes by car.

Traditional Spanish villa between the historic town of Abanilla and the thermal spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property comprises a south facing, covered terrace leading to a good size lounge with fireplace, American style kitchen with utility room, 3 double bedrooms (all with fitted wardrobes, en suite to the master bedroom and a family bathroom.
To the front of the house there is a 10m x 5m pool with sun terrace. On the opposite side there is a small orchard and to the side of the house there is a shower room and toilet for use with the pool. There is a large section of the plot that is sectioned off that would be ideal for a horse or pony.
The property has mains water / electric, alarm, air conditioning, satellite TV, telephone and internet.

A large family home close to the vibrant town of Pinoso in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain
Set in roaming countryside less than 5 minutes from the town centre, the property comprises a large entrance hallway leading to a spacious lounge with a feature wood burning stove and French doors overlooking the pool. To the right is the dining area with a further set of French doors leading to the covered terrace and pool area. Next to the dining area is a large, country style kitchen with double hob and oven. Adjacent to this there is a good size utility room with deep stone sink, ample work tops & storage cupboards and a door leading to the private courtyard.
To the right of the entrance hallway is a double bedrooms with an en suite. On the opposite side, is the main bathroom with bath and separate shower and a further 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite and French doors leading to the pool area).
There is a stairway leading to the 1st floor where you will find a very large open plan room with French doors leading to a large terrace with stunning views across the pool and valley beyond. There is a smaller room at one end which is ideal for a study and 2 good size storage rooms.
The covered terrace to the rear of the house overlooks the 8m x 4m pool with solar pipe heating and sun terrace. In the corner, there is a large, covered BBQ area and vegetable garden. Adjacent to this there is a small, gated enclosure / kennel. The garden has a variety of fruit trees, palms and flowering shrubs with irrigation and a number of outside lights and power points. To the right of the house there is a boiler room, car port and garage.
The property has mains electricity and water and benefits from full central heating, telephone, internet and satellite TV.
This is a lovely property that has lots of character including a KEKU stone built shelter used by shepherds in the area many, many years ago.

Stunning villa in a small village near the town of Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property is set in an elevated position with fabulous views across the village and mountains beyond. Quiet location yet only a short drive to Fortuna with its many amenities including a 24 hour health centre and great Saturday market.
The property is entered via a large covered terrace and double wooden door leading to a grand, open plan lounge / dining room a and kitchen. The layout is ideal fro families and entertaining guests. The lounge has gas fireplace and a lovely feature, spiral stair leading to the ¨tower room¨. This room makes in ideal study or studio, or could be used as a 4th bedroom for guests. The kitchen is a great size with breakfast bar and features a central hob, huge wine cooler and american style fridge / freezer.
Leading fro the lounge is an internal hallway with 3 double bedrooms (1 with walk in dressing room) and 2 bathrooms. A door also leads from the lounge to a 2nd covered terrace overlooking the 10m x 5m pool, sun terrace and gardens with palm trees.
On the far side of the pool is the outdoor entertaining area complete with bbq, kitchen area and al fresco dining. Next to this is a casita and large shower room that is ideal for extra guest accommodation. The property is pre installed for air conditioning
A wonderful property, finished to a very high standard with lots of charm and character.

Lovely villa close to the town centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Built in 1991, this large villa has the feeling of country living whilst being located within walking distance of town. Fortuna has a population of around 7.000 and has all the amenities including a 24 hour health centre, a large variety of supermarkets, an abundance of restaurants and bars, all the major banks, lots of shops and a fabulous Saturday market. Also close by is the famous spa baths, beauty treatment centre, hotels and restaurant at Baños de Fortuna.
The property is in excellent condition and comprises a fully glazed terrace leading to a large entrance hallway. There is a large lounge with dual aspect windows, a spacious kitchen, dining room, the internal hallway, 3 double bedrooms and a family shower room.
A door leading from the hallway takes you to the atrium room and guest accommodation. The atrium room is great for entertaining all year round. Off this room, there is a bedroom, bathroom, laundry room and a internal door to the double garage / workshop (this could be converted into a 6th bedroom with en suite). There is a stairway leading to a very spacious room which is currently used as a guest room. This room has dual aspect windows, ample space for 3 beds and lots of storage space within the roof space.
The house and gardens occupy about a quarter of the overall plot with one part set to a variety of fruit and olive trees. The 9m x 7m pool is located in front of the house with a shady outdoor dining area to one side. Approximately half of the plot has olive trees, a large storage building that could be converted into further guest accommodation, stables or a garage. The remainder of the plot is a blank canvas, ideal for growing fruit and vegetables.
The property makes a wonderful family home with lots of space for guests or would make an ideal B&B in a great location.

Traditional villa close to the town centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Built in 2004, this large villa is within walking distance of town. Fortuna has a population of around 7.000 and has all the amenities including a 24 hour health centre, 2 supermarkets, an abundance of restaurants and bars, all the major banks, lots of shops and a fabulous Saturday market. Also close by is the famous spa baths, beauty treatment centre, hotels and restaurant at Baños de Fortuna.
The property comprises a large covered terrace leading to spacious lounge with feature wood burning fire. There is a traditional style kitchen with separate dining area, 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite with walk in wardrobe) and a family and a family bathroom.
There is a feature spiral stairway to the upper floor where you will find a very large, open plan, guest room / lounge with a toilet. From here, there is a door to an l-shaped sun terrace overlooking the gardens and surrounding hills.
The gardens are low maintenance with lots of shady trees, a 10m x 5m pool to the front of the house, a large outdoor kitchen / bbq, pool side shower room and toilet. At the side of the driveway is a double garage / workshop and dog kennels to the rear of the plot.
The property makes a lovely family home with lots of space for guests or would make an ideal B&B in a great location.

A typical Spanish villa for sale set in beautiful countryside close to the town of Albaida in Valencia region of Spain
The property comprises of a large lounge, dining area, 4 bedrooms, kitchen and a family bathroom.
Set on a large plot it has wonderful views over the surrounding valleys.
It has an storage shed, mains water and electricity.

Nice villa close to the large town of Ontinyent in the Valencia region of Spain.
The property comprises 2 double bedrooms, 1 single bedroom, family bathroom, kitchen with pantry and lounge / dining room with feature fireplace. To the front of the property is a large covered terrace. Set on a flat plot of 4,127 m² with olive and almond trees, bbq area, store room and room for pool. This has mains water, electricity and tarmac access.

Luxury villa close to the centre of Totana in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Situated in a sought after area the property comprises a covered terrace leading to the entrance hall, large lounge with wood burner, modern style kitchen with dining table, 2 bedrooms downstairs and a family bathroom with shower on the ground floor.
Upstairs, there are 3 more bedrooms (1 en-suite) and a 2nd family bathroom. There is an internal stairway leading down to the utility area, garage and games room which could easily be converted to additional living accommodation.
The gardens are Ideal for entertaining with an outdoor summer kitchen and bbq overlooking the swimming pool and sun terrace. The front garden is landscaped with a good variety of trees and flowering shrubs. The property benefits from oil-fired central heating, air conditioning, telephone, internet and satellite TV.
The property is located just a few minutes from the large town of Totana where you will find all many shops, supermarkets, bars, restaurants etc. The beaches at Puerto de Mazarron are about a 30 minutes drive and San Javier airport around 50 minutes and Alicante airport about 60 minutes.

Bargain villa with great views situated between the towns of Abanilla and Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The villa has great potential as an investment and is being sold below market value for a quick sale.
The property is set on a good size plot and comprises a covered terrace, internal hallway, spacious lounge / dining room with open fireplace, large kitchen with utility room and storage, 4 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom in the main house. To the side of the property is an independent guest house with open plan lounge / bedroom and a shower room.
To the front of the house there is a large outdoor kitchen with bbq and a shower room / toilet attached. There is ample space for a large pool and garage. The views are stunning. There are 2 bar / restaurants within walking distance. Abanilla and Fortuna are both about 5 minutes by car.
The property has mains water / electric. <telephone, internet and satellite TV connections are all available.

Bargain villa with great views situated between the towns of Abanilla and Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The villa has great potential as an investment and is being sold below market value for a quick sale.
The property is set on a good size plot and comprises a covered terrace, internal hallway, spacious lounge / dining room with open fireplace, large kitchen with utility room and storage, 4 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom in the main house. To the side of the property is an independent guest house with open plan lounge / bedroom and a shower room.
To the front of the house there is a large outdoor kitchen with bbq and a shower room / toilet attached. There is ample space for a large pool and garage. The views are stunning. There are 2 bar / restaurants within walking distance. Abanilla and Fortuna are both about 5 minutes by car.
The property has mains water / electric. <telephone, internet and satellite TV connections are all available.

Lovely villa between the towns of Catral and Dolores in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property is set in stunning landscaped gardens and comprises a spacious lounge with feature fireplace, 4 double bedrooms (all with fitted wardrobes), 3 bathrooms (master bedroom en-suite with walk shower) and a modern style kitchen with utility room.
There is a lovely, south facing terrace to the front of the house overlooking the 10m x 5m pool, sun terrace, outdoor kitchen / bar, bbq and hot tub. To the rear of the house is an outdoor changing room and toilet.
The 2171m2 plot is flat and fully fenced with wonderful landscaped gardens including orange, lemon palm trees. There is a carport for 2 cars at the rear of the driveway.
The property has mains electricity, mains water, hot/cold air conditioning, alarm system, automatic electric gate, ecological septic tank, tarmac access road.
The property is located 5 minutes from the town of Catral and 15 minutes from the coast. The town has all you need for day to day living with numerous shops, supermarkets, restaurants, bar/cafes, butchers, health centre, sport centre, indoor market, schools, vets, pet shops, hairdressers, DIY, chemists, banks etc.

A well appointed villa close to the spa baths of Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property comprises a lounge with feature fireplace, large kitchen / dining room with pantry, 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom.
The gardens are both extensive and easily maintained. The very large driveway is set to block paving and leads to a triple car port. There is a 10m x 5m pool with a sun terrace and a full size tennis court. At the rear of the garden there is a large summer house and 2 feature raised flower beds.
The property benefits from an alarm system, satellite TV and wheelchair access, internet and telephone. There is a good variety of restaurants within walking distance and the town centre with shops, banks, schools etc is 3 minutes by car.

Large family villa situated between Crevillent and Elche in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property is set over 2 floors and comprises 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, lounge / dining room, kitchen and utility room. Outside, there is a large pool, bbq and outdoor kitchen area.
The property is on a manageable size plot with neighbours in the area. It is conveniently located between the large city of Elche and the traditional town of Crevillent. The coast and airport can be reached in 15 minutes.
Smartmove Properties Spain are dedicated to ensuring that our customers who buy a property in Spain with us do so safely and their new home is fully legal. Please feel free to talk to us about any aspect of the buying process in Spain that you may be unsure about

Great value villa close to the centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property is set in an elevated position with views across the valley and town. It comprises a large lounge / dining room with open fireplace, kitchen, 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom. The garden is level with space for a pool.
The property has mains water / electric and telephone, internet and satellite TV connections are available. It has good access from a tarmac road. The centre of Fortuna is within walking distance where you will find lots of amenities, a good weekly market and 24 hour health centre.

New villa close to the centre of Fortuna and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property is set in an elevated position with views across the valley and town. It comprises a large lounge / dining room with open fireplace, kitchen, utility room, 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and a family bathroom. The garden is level with space for a pool.
The property has mains water / electric and telephone, internet and satellite TV connections are available. It has good access from a tarmac road. The centre of Fortuna is within walking distance where you will find lots of amenities, a good weekly market and 24 hour health centre.

Lovely villa close to the centre of Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Set on a larger than average corner plot, the property comprises a good size lounge / dining room with feature fireplace, kitchen, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, en suite and a family bathroom. Leading from the lounge is a lovely covered terrace. To the side of the house is an 8m x 3m pool with ample sun terrace.
An external stairway leads to the solarium with lovely views across the countryside and the town centre. There are 2 bar / restaurants within easy walking distance and the town centre is 2 minutes by car where you will find a wide variety of shops, bars, restaurants and a great weekly market.

A traditional two storey property in a village village close to Pinoso town in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
This is a rare opportunity to own a lovely home in a friendly village with many facilities right on your doorstep. There is a good mix of Spanish and other European residents.
The house has a pretty sitting room on the first floor, with wooden beam ceiling and doors to a balcony with fantastic views of the surrounding countryside.
Downstairs there is a newly fitted kitchen and dining area with electric log effect fire and a walk-in pantry. The property has 2 double bedrooms, the master is on the first floor with a very large en-suite shower room and downstairs there is a second double bedroom and the main bathroom. The house is also being sold fully furnished.
Outside there is spacious and very private courtyard with a 7m x 4m swimming pool and shower. The patio and gravelled area have been built for easy maintenance however could be converted to garden if preferred. The pool pump house provides a useful outside storage space.
A door to the rear of the courtyard leads to open countryside.
There is parking directly in front of the house and the only passing traffic in this part of the village is that of local residents. The property also has telephone, satellite TV and air conditioning installed. Within a few minutes walk from your front door are a butcher, post office, bank, church, restaurants and bars, and a market once a week.
Casas del Senor and neighbouring village Chinorlet also share a village medical centre.

Traditional Spanish villa close to Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property was originally part of an old farm with this part being renovated into a country house. It has a separate deed the the remainder of the building. It comprises a large covered terrace leading to a traditional Spanish family room, kitchen bedroom and bathroom on the ground floor. Upstairs, there is an open plan room that could be converted into 2 separate bedrooms and a toilet that could be extended into a full bathroom. There is a solarium leading from this room.
Outside, there is an outdoor kitchen / bbq, large garage and 10m x 5m pool with sun terrace and covered dining area. The property has mains water / electric. Telephone, internet and satellite TV connections are all available.

Lovely family villa close to the town of Catral in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property is set on a large, easily maintained gardens and comprises an entrance hallway leading to a very spacious (40m2) lounge with feature fireplace, large dining room, kitchen with utility room, 3 double bedroom (1 en suite with corner bath), study and a family bathroom.
Adjacent to the main house is a fully self contained guest apartment (55m2) comprising a lounge / dining room, double bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. To the rear of the house is a long, covered terrace with an external stairway leading to the rooftop solarium.
To the front of the house is a 10m x 5m pool that is heated from solar panels (these also provide hot water for the house). There is a large pergola for outdoor dining and a double carport. The gardens are set to gravel with a good variety of palms, trees and flowering shrubs. To the rear of the house is an orchard with oranges, lemons, grapefruit, apple trees and more.
The property has good access from a tarmac road and benefits from an automatic gate, intercom, air conditioning (hot 7 cold), alarm, satellite TV, internet and telephone. Mains water and electric are connected.

op floor apartment in La Matanza in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
offered for sale fully furnished, the property comprises a large open plan lounge / dining room, kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom. A door form the kitchen leads to to a stairway and a wonderful rooftop solarium with great view across the surrounding countryside.
There is a large communal pool. The village has a few bars and restaurants, all within walking distance.

A traditional Spanish Villa for sale between the towns of Abanilla and Santomera in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain
Set in a quiet location amongst lemon groves the property comprises an open plan lounge / dining area with feature log burning fire, modern kitchen with pantry, large utility room, 4 bedrooms (one currently being used as a study) and 2 bathrooms.
To the front of the house there is a lovely covered terrace providing plenty of shade. Adjacent to this is the summer kitchen complete with bread oven. To one side of the main house there is a lovely secluded pool and terrace. The property has a long covered driveway with beautiful gardens and plenty of quiet sitting areas.
On the opposite side of the house is the garage with an open courtyard to the rear.
The property features wooden vaulted ceilings to the upstairs bedrooms and bathroom and benefits from a telephone, internet and satellite TV.
A beautiful home in a quiet yet very accessible location.

Well presented villa close to the centre of Hondon de los Frailes in the Costa Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
This lovely villa comprises a large covered terrace leading to an open plan lounge / dining room with feature fireplace. The is an archway leading to a good size kitchen with separate utility room and a door to the garden. There is an internal hallway with 3 double bedrooms (all with fitted wardrobes and 1 en suite) and a family bathroom.
To the front of the house is a 10m x 5m pool and sun terrace with great views of the surrounding countryside. At the end of the driveway there is a large garage / workshop. The garden behind this has a variety of fruit and olive trees. To the side of the house there is an outdoor kitchen area with BBQ.
The property benefits from full central heating, satellite TV, internet and the town centre is within walking distance.

Spacious country home is situated in a quiet hamlet close to La Romana Alicante.
The property comprises a large entrance room/ conservatory, 4 bedrooms, hallway, 2 bathrooms, an impressive kitchen with utility room and open plan lounge / dining room with wood burning stove. Central heating throughout. The property features a casita with a separate sitting room, bathroom and kitchen. A swimming pool completes this very well presented and immaculate Finca.

Lovely villa close to the town of Abanilla and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Set in a lovely hamlet with stunning views across he countryside, the property comprises a lounge / dining room with feature fireplace, modern style kitchen, 3 double bedrooms (all with fitted wardrobes) en suite to the master bedroom and a family bathroom.
To the front of the house is a lovely fully glazed terrace. The smoked glass screens are fully retractable making it ideal for both summer and winter. Leading from here is the 10m x 5m pool and a great outdoor kitchen / bbq with ample sun terrace. On the opposite side of the pool is a laundry / store room.
At the side of the house there is a stairway leading to a solarium wit fantastic 360º views across the surrounding countryside. To the rear of the house is the driveway, car port and 2 storage sheds. The remainder of the plot is set to formal gardens with many trees and flowering shrubs and an pergola for al fresco dining adjacent to the bbq.
The property has air conditioning to the lounge and master bedroom, central heating throughout, internet, telephone and satellite TV. There are numerous bars / restaurants in the area and a 24 hour health centre in Abanilla town.

Lovely villa close to the town of Abanilla and the spa baths at Baños de Fortuna in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Set in a lovely hamlet with stunning views across he countryside, the property comprises a lounge / dining room with feature fireplace, modern style kitchen, 3 double bedrooms (all with fitted wardrobes) en suite to the master bedroom and a family bathroom.
To the front of the house is a lovely fully glazed terrace. The smoked glass screens are fully retractable making it ideal for both summer and winter. Leading from here is the 10m x 5m pool and a great outdoor kitchen / bbq with ample sun terrace. On the opposite side of the pool is a laundry / store room.
At the side of the house there is a stairway leading to a solarium wit fantastic 360º views across the surrounding countryside. To the rear of the house is the driveway, car port and 2 storage sheds. The remainder of the plot is set to formal gardens with many trees and flowering shrubs and an pergola for al fresco dining adjacent to the bbq.
The property has air conditioning to the lounge and master bedroom, central heating throughout, internet, telephone and satellite TV. There are numerous bars / restaurants in the area and a 24 hour health centre in Abanilla town.

Immaculate villa close to the centre of Macisvenda in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
The property is set on the edge of the village with great view of the surrounding countryside. It comprises a lovely covered terrace leading to a spacious lounge with dual aspect windows and a feature fireplace. Leading from the lounge there is an internal hallway, very large kitchen / dining room, 3 generous bedrooms (1 en suite and all with fitted wardrobes) and a family bathroom.
The gardens are easily maintained with some trees and flowering shrubs. To the far side of the house is a solar heated 10m x 5m pool with pergola and bbq area for outdoor dining. The property benefits from oil fired central heating, internet, telephone, automatic entrance gate and satellite TV.
There is an option to buy the adjacent building plot (5.040m2) for 35.000€ or both together for 260.000€

A charming country house located just five minutes from the popular village of Hondon de Las Nieves in the Cosat Blanca / Alicante region of Spain.
The property is in excellent condition and has been renovated with traditional features such as wooden shutters and comprises a large kitchen with breakfast bar leading o the lounge with feature fireplace. An internal hallway leads to 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite) and the guest bathroom.
To the front of the house is a shady terrace with views across the valley. To the side of the house is a large garage that could be converted into further living accommodation and a stairway leading to the rooftop solarium. There is a paddock and stables.

Villa with fabulous views on the edge of Macisvenda in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.
Set in wonderful countryside yet only 2 minutes to the town centre, the property comprises a lounge / dining room with feature fireplace, modern fitted kitchen, internal hallway, 3 double bedrooms (1 en suite and a walk-in dressing room) and a guest bathroom.
To the front of the house is a covered terrace overlooking the gardens and hills on the opposite side of the valley. There is a courtyard terrace overlooking the 10m x 5m pool and sun terrace. This area is fully walled. The remainder of the gardens have many shady trees and are mainly laid to gravel.
There is a wooden casita to one side of the house and a double car port off the driveway on the other. The property benefits from a solar panel for hoy water, mains electric, water deposit, telephone, internet, partial air conditioning and satellite tv
macisvenda has a number of bars and restaurants as well as a few shops. There is a local medical centre in the town and a 24 hour health centre in close by Abanilla town.. The historic towns of Abanilla and Fortuna with its famous thermal spa are a 10 minute drive away. Less than 5 minutes the opposite direction is the town of Hondon de los Frailes which boasts a selection of good bars and restaurants, a weekly market and plenty of shops for day to day needs.

A very well appointed villa close to the historic town of Abanilla in the Costa Cálida / Murcia region of Spain.

The property benefits from a telephone, internet, satellite TV, alarm, ceiling fans to all rooms, pre installation for central heating and air conditioning, automatic entrance gate and double car port.
